<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Return true if the given indirect call site can be made to call \\p Callee.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function ensures that the number and type of the call site&#39;s arguments</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and return value match those of the given function. If the types do not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// match exactly, they must at least be bitcast compatible. If \\p FailureReason</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is non-null and the indirect call cannot be promoted, the failure reason</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// will be stored in it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e5b9e42ea84622605acea0b0d721fda">isLegalToPromote</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;CB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;Callee,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;&#42;FailureReason = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Promote the given indirect call site to unconditionally call \\p Callee.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function promotes the given call site, returning the direct call or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// invoke instruction. If the function type of the call site doesn&#39;t match that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of the callee, bitcast instructions are inserted where appropriate. If \\p</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// RetBitCast is non-null, it will be used to store the return value bitcast,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// if created.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a90c1755a8480ebc1dcc4f05d56271b00">promoteCall</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;CB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;Callee,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/castinst">CastInst</a> &#42;&#42;RetBitCast = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Promote the given indirect call site to conditionally call \\p Callee. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// promoted direct call instruction is predicated on &#96;CB.getCalledOperand() ==</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Callee&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function creates an if-then-else structure at the location of the call</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// site. The original call site is moved into the &quot;else&quot; block. A clone of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// indirect call site is promoted, placed in the &quot;then&quot; block, and returned. If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p BranchWeights is non-null, it will be used to set !prof metadata on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// new conditional branch.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a23c23396eb61a7a78555e926700dbf47">promoteCallWithIfThenElse</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;CB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;Callee,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42;BranchWeights = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a23c23396eb61a7a78555e926700dbf47">promoteCallWithIfThenElse</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;CB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;Callee,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pgocontextualprofile">PGOContextualProfile</a> &amp;CtxProf);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This is similar to &#96;promoteCallWithIfThenElse&#96; except that the condition to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// promote a virtual call is that \\p VPtr is the same as any of \\p</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// AddressPoints.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function is expected to be used on virtual calls (a subset of indirect</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// calls). \\p VPtr is the virtual table address stored in the objects, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p AddressPoints contains vtable address points. A vtable address point is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a location inside the vtable that&#39;s referenced by vpointer in C++ objects.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// TODO: sink the address-calculation instructions of indirect callee to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// indirect call fallback after transformation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae529107c3b550f7e2fe6128a26c8f1da">promoteCallWithVTableCmp</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;CB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;VPtr,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;Callee,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Constant &#42;&gt;</a> AddressPoints,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42;BranchWeights);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Try to promote (devirtualize) a virtual call on an Alloca. Return true on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// success.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Look for a pattern like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  %o = alloca %class.Impl</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  %1 = getelementptr %class.Impl, %class.Impl&#42; %o, i64 0, i32 0, i32 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  store i32 (...)&#42;&#42; bitcast (i8&#42;&#42; getelementptr inbounds</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      (&#123; &#91;3 x i8&#42;&#93; &#125;, &#123; &#91;3 x i8&#42;&#93; &#125;&#42; @&#95;ZTV4Impl, i64 0, inrange i32 0, i64 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      to i32 (...)&#42;&#42;), i32 (...)&#42;&#42;&#42; %1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  %2 = getelementptr inbounds %class.Impl, %class.Impl&#42; %o, i64 0, i32 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  %3 = bitcast %class.Interface&#42; %2 to void (%class.Interface&#42;)&#42;&#42;&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  %vtable.i = load void (%class.Interface&#42;)&#42;&#42;, void (%class.Interface&#42;)&#42;&#42;&#42; %3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  %4 = load void (%class.Interface&#42;)&#42;, void (%class.Interface&#42;)&#42;&#42; %vtable.i</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  call void %4(%class.Interface&#42; nonnull %2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @&#95;ZTV4Impl = linkonce&#95;odr dso&#95;local unnamed&#95;addr constant &#123; &#91;3 x i8&#42;&#93; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     &#123; &#91;3 x i8&#42;&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     &#91;i8&#42; null, i8&#42; bitcast (&#123; i8&#42;, i8&#42;, i8&#42; &#125;&#42; @&#95;ZTI4Impl to i8&#42;),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     i8&#42; bitcast (void (%class.Impl&#42;)&#42; @&#95;ZN4Impl3RunEv to i8&#42;)&#93; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad3219f7b717320ae52f53ccb09ad5a84">tryPromoteCall</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;CB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Predicate and clone the given call site.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function creates an if-then-else structure at the location of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// call site. The &quot;if&quot; condition compares the call site&#39;s called value to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the given callee. The original call site is moved into the &quot;else&quot; block,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and a clone of the call site is placed in the &quot;then&quot; block. The cloned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instruction is returned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a84163d559062da6b736ab943644e0a16">versionCallSite</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;CB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Callee, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42;BranchWeights);</span></CodeLine>
